text: really good piece from Khoi Vinh in iWatch: <http://www.subtraction.com/2014/06/24/wearables-fashion-and-iwatch/>

attachments.title: Wearables, Fashion and iWatch
attachments.text: Anticipation for Apple’s rumored iWatch is getting higher and higher. In fact, I’m in the market for a new watch, and the idea of a connected, multi-sensored, paradigm-smashing new device is tempti...

text: key line for me "We could all choose to wear the same thing, and yet we don’t"
